questions.question: What is the primary purpose of digital signatures?
options: A) To verify the authenticity of a message
B) To encrypt data for secure transmission
C) To authenticate the sender of a message
D) To compress data for faster transmission

questions.question: What is the purpose of input validation in web development?
options: A) To improve the user experience
B) To prevent SQL injection attacks
C) To ensure data consistency across all users
D) To enhance security through encryption

questions.question: What is the importance of secure password storage in web development?
options: A) It is not a critical aspect of web development
B) It ensures data integrity and consistency
C) It enhances user experience through faster login times
D) It prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data

questions.question: What is the purpose of HTTP headers in web development?
options: A) To improve page load times
B) To enhance user experience through better content delivery
C) To provide metadata about a request or response
D) To encrypt data for secure transmission

questions.question: What is the importance of keeping software up-to-date in web development?
options: A) It improves user experience through faster page loads
B) It enhances security by patching vulnerabilities
C) It ensures data consistency across all users
D) It prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data

questions.question: What is the purpose of Content Security Policy (CSP) in web development?
options: A) To improve page load times
B) To enhance user experience through better content delivery
C) To define which sources of content are allowed to be executed within a web page
D) To encrypt data for secure transmission

questions.question: What is the importance of validating user input in web development?
options: A) It improves user experience through faster login times
B) It enhances security by preventing SQL injection attacks
C) It ensures data consistency across all users
D) It prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data

questions.question: What is the purpose of using secure protocols (HTTPS) in web development?
options: A) To improve page load times
B) To enhance user experience through better content delivery
C) To encrypt data for secure transmission and protect against eavesdropping
D) To prevent unauthorized access to sensitive data

questions.question: What is the importance of regularly backing up data in web development?
options: A) It improves user experience through faster page loads
B) It enhances security by preventing data loss
C) It ensures data consistency across all users
D) It prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data

questions.question: What is the purpose of using secure protocols (FTP) in web development?
options: A) To improve page load times
B) To enhance user experience through better content delivery
C) To encrypt data for secure transmission and protect against eavesdropping
D) To prevent unauthorized access to sensitive data
